text:
It appears that there's a problem with the addCookie method.  I examined the 
source code and found that in CookieTools.java (in the getCookieHeaderValue 
method), the cookie name and value are URLEncoded.  This seems to cause 
serious problems when other applications try to read the cookies because the 
values are not what was written.  Cookie values should not be URLEncoded (and 
neither should the names).  The original JServ did not do this.
creator: dbixler@e-centives.com
